original_text: Now no shrub had yet appeared on the earth and no plant had yet sprung up, for the Lord God had not sent rain on the earth and there was no one to work the ground,
korean_text: 여호와 하나님이 땅에 비를 내리지 아니하셨고 땅을 갈 사람도 없었으므로 들에는 초목이 아직 없었고 밭에는 채소가 나지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: Now no shrub had yet appeared on the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 땅에는 아직 어떤 덤불도 나타나지 않았고

sentences.original_text: and no plant had yet sprung up
for the Lord God had not sent rain on the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주 하나님이 땅에 비를 보내지 않으셨고

sentences.original_text: and there was no one to work the ground
